info.name: Blocket Dark
info.description: Gör Blocket mörkare, och fixar samtidigt vissa fonts som Blockets amatör kodare trott ska fungera bra på Windows maskiner.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0.1
-----------
- Made the map over Sweden grayscale on the index page
- Changed the colors and design of item pages
- Fixed item pages for cars
- Removed "Tyck Till" graphic
- Listed items that has more than 1 picture, only shows 1 picture in the thumbnail. It looks better.


v1.0.0
-----------
- Fixed font issues caused by original coders
- Added text shadow on most text
- Made site a little bit darker
- Made logos black & white

Theme is not currently 100% finished. There are still elements that needs to be polished. 

Note: Only the standard page is customized. The house/aparment and jobs page on the site is not customized at all.

Donations appreciated at my PayPal (webmaster@smurfrp.com)
